chara.textHome:
Ah, hold on a sec!
 I'm putting my makeup on...
Okay, you can look!
Yoohoo! I'm Emiri Kisaki!

So, yeah, tell me somethin' really cool!
C'mon, I'm all ears!

I just like, you know, wanna
get excited about something!
Doesn't matter what!

I got this...like...in golf...
one shot...

a hole-in-one!
That's for reals the hardest, yeah?

But, right now, I just know
I can knock one in!

Oh, did I just, like, go past the MAX?
Meee?

It's kinda like, there was this whoosh
in my head and, POW, now I'm
totally enlightened or something!
Ohhhmygosh, I'm sooo on a roll!
Watch... 42!
See?! Yeah?!
Hm? The answer to 6x7, that's what!
Answers never just pop up like that!
Phew... I'm like, getting super smart!

Ah, somethin' HUGE just came to me...
Wanna know?

Don't use any money,
and you'll be rich in no time!

I'm like, a genius!
That's the secret to winning like,
everything, isn't it?!
Heyyy! How's it going?

I'm doin' great!
I'm, like, amazing or something!
Hope we find something exciting today too!

Morning!
I'm always super awake in the morning.
I'm ready to go. Right now!
Like, just look how wide awake I am!
I'm hungryyy! What's for lunch...

I already ate everything I brought!
There's, like nothing left!

Oh no, what have I done?!
I'm still so hungry!
Hey, wanna go out to eat?
Let's totally get something sweet!
Cake?
Nah...
I want something fruity!
I'm, like, super into that right now!

Doesn't it feel like a totes waste
going to bed at night?

Every day, I stay up as long as I can
'til I can't help but fall asleep...
It's the best!

Like, who even decided that one
day would only have 24 hours.
It's nowhere near enough time!

I wonder if I could wish for
each day to be longer...
Yay, yaaay! I've been waiting!
Let's gooo! I'm super pumped!
The search begins now!
It'll be fine, totally fine!

Not that I have any reason to
be this confident, Hahaha!
Anyway, totally leave it to me!
Yep, okay... Hmm... This is...
There's no doubt about it...
My makeup is SO on point today!
I mean...

I totes get that being a Magical Girl
is super dangerous and all!
But it's too late now.
I already am one!

Everyone's like, 
"Emily's so caj. She's just so caj!"

And I'm like, "Uh, no! I'm totes serious.
Like when I decide to be."
O.M.G.! That girl was so cute!
Seriously!

Even just remembering I'm like...
what a cutie!
Man, I really like the cute ones!

Heyyy, I, like, wanted to ask you.
Do you like dogs or cats better?

I'm like totally into dogs AND cats.
Double the fun!

I also like pandas, and iguanas are
super cool too!
I HATE being bored!

I get so restless if I don't
have something to do!

Let's go do something!
Come onnn!

This might surprise you, but
I actually  really like fishing.

I used to go when I was a kid a lot 
with the boys.
I'll show you my mad skills some time!
I used to catch bugs a lot, too.

Grasshoppers were my favorite.
Not locusts. Just grasshoppers.
Their legs are like, totally amazing!
There was this person I totally looked up to,

but she moved somewhere
like a bajillion miles away.

It's kinda sad, 
but there's no use crying over it!
We're gonna totally win!
Yay! We won!
I'm Just Getting Started!
Looking good!
I'm like super duper strong!

Meee? Emiri Kisaki!
As long as I'm here, things'll all work out!
I don't really get it, but that's how it goes!
Ahaha! So, what's up? Great to meetcha!
Aren't I, like, the cutest?!
C'mon, c'mon, I so am, aren't I?!!!
Hey, um, don't I look amazing?!
I've totally reached the point of amaaazing!

I'm definitely one step higher
on the Magical Girl scale!

I go to the batting cage every one in a while,
so I know this feeling.

I'd totally hit a home run
if I swung right now!
Ah! Sure felt that! It was like, ZING!

Like gettin' one of those whatchamacallems
in bowling...a tanuki?
Huh?
Oh! Turkey! Yeah, that!
